title: Mother and daughter doctor-heroes
description: They've been called the "saints of Somalia." Doctor Hawa Abdi and her daughter Deqo Mohamed discuss their medical clinic in Somalia, where -- in the face of civil war and open oppression of women -- they've built a hospital, a school and a community of peace.
author: Hawa Abdi + Deqo Mohamed
keywords: TED, talks, community, global issues, health, medicine, science, women
